hub.title: Farm Management Hub
hub.description: Your central place to manage all farm operations, from crop cycles and KNF inputs to labor and financials.

myFarms.title: My Farms & Crops
myFarms.description: View and manage your farms, plots, and active crop cycles.

fgw.description: Learn and apply the core principles of Farming God's Way.

seedStarting.title: Seed Starting Guide
seedStarting.description: Plan your planting season with our comprehensive seed starting guide.

familyFarm.description: Explore the integrated model for a sustainable 200sqm family farm.
